request.description:
This endpoint retrieves all job Schedules of the company. #### Request Params | Name | Value | | --- | --- | | **job_flag_ids** | Array of job’s flag ids
(To get only those job’s Schedules which belongs to a particular flag) | | **job_address** | Pass job’s address to get only those job’s Schedules which belongs to a particular address
This filter will perform the searching on (address line 1, city and zip) | | **job_id** | Send a particular job id to get the schedules of a single job only | | **customer_id** | Send a particular customer id to get the schedules of a single customer only | | **sub_ids\[\]** | Array of job’s sub contractors ids
(To get only those job’s schedules which belongs to a particular sub contractors) | | **date** | Pass date in Y-M-D format to get job’s schedules of or after a particular date only.

Means to get schedules of or after 17 May, User has to send 2023-05-17 | | **start_date_time** | Pass date in Y-M-D format to get job’s schedules after a particular date only.

Means to get schedules after 17 May, User has to send 2023-05-17 | | **end_date_time** | Pass date in Y-M-D format to get job’s schedules before a particular date only.

Means to get schedules before 17 May, User has to send 2023-05-17 | | **type** | To get list of a particular type (value must be in event or schedule)

Pass schedule to get schedules and send event to get events | | **includes\[\]** | Options available: `created_by, modified_by, sub_contractors, reps, trades, work_types, work_crew_notes, reminders, job, customer` | > Example `includes[]=job&includes[]=customer` #### includes\[\] Details > created_by The Created by information will be returned by includes in the format below: ``` json "created_by": { "id": 640, "first_name": "Abhi", "last_name": "Sharma", "email": "abhi@gmail.com", "company_id": 84, "company": "Windowrepaier treatment compnay", "admin_privilege": false, "group": { "id": 5, "name": "owner" }, "added_date": "2022-03-28 12:31:06", "profile_pic": null, "active": true, "company_name": null, "color": "blue", "role": [ { "name": "plus-admin" } ] } ``` created_by field will have all the information related to user who created the job schedules like user id, first name, last name etc. ##### Created_by field detail \* **id**: Unique user id. \* **first_name**: First name of the user. \* **last_name**: Last name of the user. \* **email**: Email of the user. \* **company_id**: Company id of the user. \* **company**: Company details of the user. \* **admin_privilege**: shows if user has admin privileges or not. \* **group**: User group information of the user. \* **added_date**: The date and time when the user was created in the system. \* **profile_pic**: Profile picture of the user. \* **active**: Shows if user is active or not. \* **company_name**: Company name of the user if user is commercial. \* **color**: Color information associated with user. \* **role**: Role information of the user. > modified_by modified_by fields detail will be same as created_by. > sub_contractors sub_contractors fields detail will be same as created_by. > reps reps fields detail will be same as created_by. > trades The Trades information will be returned by includes in the format below: ``` json "trades": { "data": [ { "id": 8, "name": "ROOFING", "color": "#9C2542" } ] } ``` trades field will have the list of trades associated with the job schedules. ##### Trades field detail \* **id**: Unique trades id. \* **name**: Name of the trades i.e (ROOFING, LIGHTING, CARPENTRY etc). \* **color**: Color information associated with trades. > work_types The Work type information will be returned by includes in the format below: ``` json "work_types": { "data": [ { "id": 9, "name": "TEST TRDAES", "trade_id": 1, "color": "#0D98BA" } ] } ``` work_types field will have the list of work types associated with the job schedules. ##### Work type field detail \* **id**: Unique work types id. \* **name**: Work type name. \* **trade_id**: Trade id associated with work type. \* **color**: Color information associated with work type. > work_crew_notes The Work Crew Notes information will be returned by includes in the format below: ``` json "work_crew_notes": { "data": [ { "id": 125, "job_id": 12080, "note": "test notes", } ] } ``` work_crew_notes field will have the list of work crew notes associated with the job schedules. ##### Work crew notes field detail \* **id**: Unique work crew notes id. \* **job_id**: id of job. \* **note**: work crew note. > reminders It will have Array of reminders with information like remider type, id and other details. ``` json "reminders": { "data": [ { "id": 202, "type": "email", "minutes": "10" } ] } ``` reminders field will have the list of reminders associated with the job schedules. ##### Reminders field detail \* **id**: Unique reminders id. \* **type**: Type of reminders (email/push). \* **minutes**: Prior time of reminders. > job The Job information will be returned by includes in the format below: ``` json "job": { "id": 12080, "name": "test data", "number": "2204-369-02", "customer_id": 369, "description": "test open api data", "same_as_customer_address": 1, "other_trade_type_description": null, "created_by": 640, "created_at": "2022-04-11 05:13:30", "created_date": "2022-04-11 05:13:30", "updated_at": "2022-04-11 06:59:03", "deleted_at": null, "call_required": false, "appointment_required": false, "tax_rate": null, "alt_id": "1", "lead_number": "1", "duration": "0:0:0", "completion_date": null, "contract_signed_date": null, "current_stage": { "name": "Lead", "color": "cl-red", "code": "1915119475" }, "contact_same_as_customer": 1, "insurance": 0, "archived": null, "hover_job_id": null, "awarded_date": null, "stage_last_modified": "2022-04-11 05:13:31", "multi_job": 0, } ``` job field will have the list of jobs associated with the job schedules. ##### Job field detail \* **id**: Unique job id. \* **name**: Job name. \* **number**: Job number. \* **customer_id**: Customer id associated with job. \* **description**: Job description. \* **same_as_customer_address**: If job address is same as customer address. \* **other_trade_type_description**: if trades is other then this field will have other trade note. \* **created_by**: User id who created the job. \* **created_at**: The date and time when the customer was created. \* **updated_at**: The date and time when the job last updated. \* **deleted_at**: The date and time when the job as deleted. \* **call_required**: If call required or not when added. \* **appointment_required**: If appointment required or not when added. \* **tax_rate**: Tax rate information. \* **alt_id**: Alternate job id. \* **lead_number**: Lead number. \* **duration**: Duration of the job. \* **completion_date**: Date time when job was completed. \* **contract_signed_date**: Date time when contract was signed. \* **current_stage**: Job stage information. \* **contact_same_as_customer**: If Contact user is same as customer. \* **insurance**: If job has insurance or not. \* **archived**: If job is archived or not. \* **multi_job**: if job is multiple jobs in single jobs. > customer The Customer information that will be returned by includes in the format below: ``` json "customer": { "id": 369, "company_name": "test company", "first_name": "Bharti", "last_name": "Devi", "email": "bharti10@gmail.com", "additional_emails": [], "referred_by_type": "", "referred_by_note": "", "call_required": false, "appointment_required": false, "note": " ", "is_commercial": 0, "created_at": "2022-04-08 12:10:03", "updated_at": "2022-04-08 12:10:04", "deleted_at": null, "management_company": "", "property_name": "", "canvasser": " ", "call_center_rep": " " } ``` customer field will have customer data associated with the job. ##### Customer field detail \* **id**: Unique customer id. \* **company_name**: Company name of the representative if user is commercial. \* **first_name**: First name of the customer. \* **last_name**: Last name of the customer. \* **email**: Email of the customer. \* **additional_emails**: Additional emails of the customer. \* **referred_by_type**: Customer referral type (referral, customer, other). \* **referred_by_note**: if referred_by_type is other then this field will have referral note. \* **call_required**: If call required or not when added. \* **appointment_required**: If appointment required or not when added. \* **note**: Note will have notes about the customer. \* **is_commercial**: If individual or commercial. \* **created_at**: The date and time when the customer was created. \* **deleted_at**: The date and time when the customer was deleted. \* **management_company**: Management company of the customer. \* **property_name**: Customer property name. \* **canvasser**: Canvasser Name. \* **call_center_rep**: Call centre representative. #### Request Params (for filtering) | Name | Value | | --- | --- | | **customer_name** | Customer first name | | **division_ids\[\]** | Arrays Of Divisions ids | | **category_ids\[\]** | Arrays Of Category ids | | **job_rep_ids\[\]** | Ids of job reps | | **job_id** | Job id | | **trades\[\]** | Array of trades ids | | **work_types\[\]** | Array of work types ids | > Example `job_id=12080` ### Request Params (for sorting) | Name | Value | | --- | --- | | **sort_by** | Options available: `id` | | **sort_order** | Options available: `asc, desc` | > Example `?sort_by=id&sort_order=asc`

request.description:
You need to provide Params according to your desired Category Product.

1. Materials -
    
    1. name - (required)
        
    2. code - (optional)
        
    3. unit - (required)
        
    4. unit_cost - (required)
        
    5. selling_price - (optional)
        
    6. description - (optional)
        
    7. colors - (optional)
        
    8. styles - (optional)
        
    9. sizes - (optional)
        
    10. category_id - (required)
        
    11. supplier_id - (In case if the Material Product belongs to a custom Supplier only then we need to pass this key) (optional).
        
2. Labor -
    
    1. name - (required)
        
    2. code - (optional)
        
    3. unit - (required)
        
    4. unit_cost - (required)
        
    5. selling_price - (optional)
        
    6. description - (optional)
        
    7. category_id - (required)
        
3. Insurance -
    
    1. for_all_trades - (one of for_all_trades and trade_ids is required)
        
    2. code -(optional)
        
    3. unit - (required)
        
    4. unit_cost - (required)
        
    5. description - (required)
        
    6. category_id - (required)
        
    7. trade_ids(If only for_all_trades key is not present) - (one of for_all_trades and trade_ids is required)
        
4. Others (Activity, Misc, No Charge) -
    
    1. name - (required)
        
    2. unit - (required)
        
    3. unit_cost - (required)
        
    4. code - (optional)
        
    5. category_id - (required)
        
    6. selling_price - (optional)
        
    7. description - (optional)
        
    8. for_all_trades - (one of for_all_trades and trade_ids is required)
        
    9. trade_ids(If only for_all_trades key is not present) - (one of for_all_trades and trade_ids is required)
